paper.title: ACTIVE LEARNING METHODOLOGIES IN GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEMS AN IN APPLIED REMOTE SENSING
paper.abstract: This study aims to compare and evaluate the implementation of active learning methodologies in the subjects of Geographic Information Systems (GIS) and Remote Sensing Applied. For GIS, was proposed additional practical work using new information technologies (open source gvSIG). For Remote Sensing, practical work has always been proposed with the development of a portfolio and the subject is taught entirely in a computer classroom to coordinate and to time the theoretical and practical lectures. From the calculation of performance indicators (PI) and success (SI) showed that in GIS, the PI increased significantly (13%) since these changes were applied. In Remote Sensing it was observed values greater than 70% and 90% for PI and SI, respectively. The results of this study indicate that the use of active learning methodologies improve student performance.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究的是地理信息系统（GIS）和遥感应用中的主动学习方法，以及这些方法对学生表现的影响。论文内容并未涉及任何金融领域，特别是衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
